actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit television networks from owning, operating, or having a controlling interest in a television station licensed under that act.

summary.text: Prohibits television networks from owning, operating, or having a controlling interest in a television station licensed under the Communications Act of 1934.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit television networks from owning, operating, or having a controlling interest in a television station licensed under that act.
